Keywords: Arakko , Mystical , Warrior
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
THE IMMORTAL WHITE SWORD OF THE IVORY SPIRE: Steal Energy. // Once per turn, when The White Sword rolls a single d6, after resolutions you may heal him equal to half the result.
FIGHTING FOR GENERATIONS: Combat Reflexes, Invulnerability, Super Senses.

January 16, 2023
JhonnyMc
Don't you heal half of a die roll? That's blades and super senses. Even if they miss an attack on you because of SS you heal. I think that's worthy of the points.
November 16, 2022
BLsquared
Or maybe give him the Wonder Woman bracers so he can succeed (and heal) from his Super Senses more often?
October 28, 2022
tidge
Many Sword Bearers simply become better by paying +5 points, some become nasty, but this figure practically REQUIRES it. The reason being the special attack power's ability to allow him to heal from d6 rolls (BCF, Leadership, Super Senses) or any other effects he may have such as Shape Change (via Warlock) or those courtesy of other figures. Even so... this dial is a LOT of points for not being very deep and also being very likely to be neutralized (or KOed) before it could do much. If the defense power had Protected: Outwit, I feel like that would go a long way to making the cost much more bearable.
